28
29#ifndef _ZFS_NAMECHECK_H
30#define _ZFS_NAMECHECK_H
31
32#ifdef __cplusplus
33extern "C" {
34#endif
35
36typedef enum {
37 NAME_ERR_LEADING_SLASH, /* name begins with leading slash */
38 NAME_ERR_EMPTY_COMPONENT, /* name contains an empty component */
39 NAME_ERR_TRAILING_SLASH, /* name ends with a slash */
40 NAME_ERR_INVALCHAR, /* invalid character found */
41 NAME_ERR_MULTIPLE_AT, /* multiple '@' characters found */
42 NAME_ERR_NOLETTER, /* pool doesn't begin with a letter */
43 NAME_ERR_RESERVED, /* entire name is reserved */
44 NAME_ERR_DISKLIKE, /* reserved disk name (c[0-9].*) */
45 NAME_ERR_TOOLONG, /* name is too long */
46 NAME_ERR_NO_AT, /* permission set is missing '@' */
47} namecheck_err_t;
48
49#define ZFS_PERMSET_MAXLEN 64
50
51int pool_namecheck(const char *, namecheck_err_t *, char *);
52int dataset_namecheck(const char *, namecheck_err_t *, char *);
53int mountpoint_namecheck(const char *, namecheck_err_t *);
54int zfs_component_namecheck(const char *, namecheck_err_t *, char *);
55int permset_namecheck(const char *, namecheck_err_t *, char *);
56
57#ifdef __cplusplus
58}
59#endif
60
61#endif /* _ZFS_NAMECHECK_H */
62
